attributes.name: XivelyLib
attributes.author: Davide Gironi <davide.gironi@gmail.com>
attributes.sentence: A Spark.io to xively.com data logger library.

readme:
About === A [Spark.io] (https://www.spark.io/) library to log data to [xively.com] (https://xively.com/). Xively (formerly Cosm and before that Pachube) is an on-line database service allowing developers to connect sensor-derived data (e.g. energy and environment data from objects, devices & buildings) to the Web and to build their own applications based on that data. This library provide methods to log datapoints of any type to a Xively feed through the use of a Spark Core. Copyright --- Copyright (c) Davide Gironi, 2014
[http://davidegironi.it] (http://davidegironi.it/)
License --- Released under GPLv3.
Please refer to LICENSE file for licensing information.
